Text: Thank you so much for this. I missed the first few talks when they were broadcast on radio. They are a delight, every single one of them. My favourites, off-hand, include his recollections about being swindled by the Arab peddler who sold him a fossil of 'copulating trilobites' and how excited he was at such an 'earth-shaking' find, and his reminiscences about his first pet, the Fire Salamander, who contrary to popular belief cannot live in fire. ;-)  Good to have them all collected together in mp3 format. Hope he finds time to share more of his memories with us.
Thanks, Dr. Attenborough is a hero of mine.
